FuncDef: The display port-isolate group command displays configurations of interface isolation groups. The display port-isolate group command displays configurations of interface isolation groups.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays configurations of all isolation groups.
-

Displays configurations of a specified interface isolation group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 64.

ExtraInfo: After creating interface isolation groups using the port-isolate enable command, run the display port-isolate group command to view configurations of the interface isolation groups, which facilitates fault location and analysis.
